text: Bernard Meynadier (born 19 April 1938) is a French rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's eight where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Saint-Germain-en-Laye Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for France Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Bernard Meynadier
